body:
I know you guys might not care because I am hugely hated my the Avicus Community but sadly, I have not been feeling well this past few weeks. I went to the doctor with my parents and the doctor asked me to go to the hospital. They did a scan and they found out that I have a early stage cancer and I might not be able to recover from it. I have at least 2 months before the cancer spreads to my whole body and I will obviously die. I appreciate all the support and all the hate that you guys have given me. Thank you.

Peace

-nerfgun2002
body_tagged:
I know you guys might not care because I am hugely hated my the Avicus Community but sadly, I have not been feeling well this past few weeks. I went to the doctor with my parents and the doctor asked me to go to the hospital. They did a scan and they found out that I have a early stage cancer and I might not be able to recover from it. I have at least 2 months before the cancer spreads to my whole body and I will obviously die. I appreciate all the support and all the hate that you guys have given me. Thank you.

Peace

-nerfgun2002
title: [Before I Die] nerfgun2002

replies.body:
Hi nerfgun, I have never met you before , you seem like a nice person.
I feel very bad...There's gotta be a way out.It must be an awful feeling knowing you will die one day,and you know when and why.
Get well,keep fighting!
About the haters, I know,many people also hate me,not in avicus, but on many other forums.

“No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin, or his background, or his religion. People must learn to hate, and if they can learn to hate, they can be taught to love, for love comes more naturally to the human heart than its opposite.”

replies.body:
If you ever need someone to talk here is my skype: dj.tk12

Best luck of the world, I had a friend wich got cancer, he was in my football team, his name was Marc.
He fighted and fighted and then...

He won....

He rejoined the team, he told us on a little conference that the most important thing is have WISHES TO LIVE, to NEVER GIVE UP and FIGHT TILL TE END!

His story inspired a singer called Macaco to do a song.... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=StpeoZ8ZJp0

He is the guy from 2:03..
What im trying to say is almos that... NEVER LEAVE YOUR PASSION OF LIVE!

replies.body:
Damn, I have nothing to say. dilpickel pretty much ninja'd me, however, I'll try to be make this as comforting as I can.

I'm surprised at the lack of continuous comments on you getting well. Come on guys, lets have some humanity :(

My piece of advice to you is to never give up. Keep fighting the cancer and always hope that your body has a chance. The doctor said that you might not survive, however focus on the other percentage and strive for it. Never give up and grow ill over this.

Whatever you wanted to do, do it now. Its summer and you have a full time ahead of you.

Because if you are ready to give up then you have already lost. Keep fighting and you have a chance man. Don't give up.

I feel that after this, despite your infraction you should be given a pardon for the mean time to have fun on the server. I never got to know you and I would like to do that now if you are willing. 

Here, if you have a skype my skype name is Zintenka Brimem. We can talk and get to know eachother over there.

Damn, I have nothing to say. dilpickel pretty much ninja'd me, however, I'll try to be make this as comforting as I can.

My piece of advice to you is to never give up. Keep fighting the cancer and always hope that your body has a chance. The doctor said that you might not survive, however focus on the other percentage and strive for it. Never give up and grow ill over this.

Whatever you wanted to do, do it now. Its summer and you have a full time ahead of you.

Because if you are ready to give up then you have already lost. Keep fighting and you have a chance man. Don't give up.

I feel that after this, despite your infraction you should be given a pardon for the mean time to have fun on the server. I never got to know you and I would like to do that now if you are willing. 

Here, if you have a skype my skype name is Zintenka Brimem. We can talk and get to know eachother over there.

replies.body:
You can do it, I never knew you, but have faith. Whatever you believe and wherever you go, someone will be watching over you. Just fight it and fight it until you can be a survivor. Now, more people survive cancer than die from it, so just stay as fit and healthy as you can while doing everything you have ever wanted to do. I believe in you! Add me on Skype if you need to talk about anything. Good luck!!!
Skype: live:oscar.su6

Add me on Skype if you need to talk about anything. Good luck!!!

replies.body:
Shit mate.

I need to tell you a few things about cancer though.

Fight through it, even through tough times keep fighting. My granddad had cancer for 35 years, it was terminal too. But he believed he would live, and he lived through all the cancer, despite it being extremely bad.

Believe in yourself, still take the medication, but believe in yourself. It's how many people pull through mate.

My Skype is FrozenSolstice if you ever want to talk.
replies.body_tagged:
Shit mate.

I need to tell you a few things about cancer though.

Fight through it, even through tough times keep fighting. My granddad had cancer for 35 years, it was terminal too. But he believed he would live, and he lived through all the cancer, despite it being extremely bad.

Believe in yourself, still take the medication, but believe in yourself. It's how many people pull through mate.

My Skype is FrozenSolstice if you ever want to talk.

replies.body:
Before you say anything else, I'd like to remind you that cancer is a quite serious disease so you shouldn't fool around about it. However, if you're saying the truth and you're actually going to die, then, I feel sorry for you man, I don't get why good human beings have to leave this place when they're such young  people and they have a whole life ahead of them.
I wish you the best of lucks, stay strong man and always remember, giving up is not an option. 
I'll be praying for you so take care o/
d:^)

replies.body:
Hey Nerf,

Although I don't know you, I feel sorry that someone so young like you is in the situation you are in. My parents always tell me to 'always look on the bright side of things'. It may be hard but if you can do this your already moving one step forward in fighting your illness. I wish you the best of luck in your battle and remember to NEVER give up!

Stay strong bud and if you ever need any help we are all here for you <3
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Nerf,

Although I don't know you, I feel sorry that someone so young like you is in the situation you are in. My parents always tell me to 'always look on the bright side of things'. It may be hard but if you can do this your already moving one step forward in fighting your illness. I wish you the best of luck in your battle and remember to NEVER give up!

Stay strong bud and if you ever need any help we are all here for you <3

replies.body_tagged: I'm so sorry :( I'm here if you wanna talk or anything, my skype is the same as my ign. Stay strong bud, we're all here for you!

replies.body: Also nerfgun, I watched a movie about a year ago and I would like to recommend it to you.The movie is called "The Bucket List (2007)".It's a movie with people in your situation, no matter how much you have to live left, you should live and enjoy your life before you die.Duration is 90m.
